creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: right sheet of a triptych; vertical ōban
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Actor name at lower left inscribed by hand. Related to the play Genke hachidai megumi no tsuwamono 源家八代恵剛者, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 11th lunar month 1847.
title: Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō VIII as Aku Genta Yoshihira
